amendatorysection.catchline: Campaign Finance Limitation Cash Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Campaign Finance Limitation Cash Fund is hereby created. The fund shall be used by the commission to provide public financing of campaigns pursuant to the Campaign Finance Limitation Act, except that transfers may be made to the General Fund at the direction of the Legislature. The fund shall consist of money appropriated to it by the Legislature, amounts repaid by candidates pursuant to sections 32-1606 and 32-1607, and taxpayer contributions to the fund pursuant to section 77-27,119.04. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
